name: Sanyo Pachinko Paradise 2: Umi Monogatari Special
overview: Sanyo Pachinko Paradise 2 - Umi Monogatari Special is the second game in the longest pachinko gambling series (they continue the series in the Playstation 2 console) made by Irem, the game features a library, 4 pachinko machines and also a story mode in which the player is a pachinko gambler that wants to become millionaire playing pachinko machines.
